You can conclude that it is not going to respect the buffalo. Rule3: If the squid has more than 10 friends, then the squid does not learn the basics of resource management from the leopard. Rule4: If at least one animal removes from the board one of the pieces of the viperfish, then the squid learns the basics of resource management from the leopard. So the statement "the squid respects the buffalo" is disproved and the answer is "no".
